    • Uses of ListChangeListener in javafx.collections

      Classes in javafx.collections that implement ListChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WeakListChangeListener<E>
      A WeakListChangeListener can be used, if an ObservableList should only maintain a weak reference to the listener.
